title: Autumn of the Beta
description: With one threat neutralized, something new prowls along the borders of the Silver Lake Packâ€™s territory, bringing with it the scent of true evil.As beta of his pack, Donovan longs for only two things: his pack to be safe and a mate to call his own. When this new threat comes around, how far is Donovan willing to go for the safety of his pack, and the mate he is yet to claim? Will he find his balls and tell Kathleen how he truly feels about her?Kathleen knows first hand what kind of threat is sniffing around. Unable to give voice to her own demons, will she have the courage to stay? Or will she run, avoiding the inevitable confrontation and rejection?And what the heck is a gingeroo?
author: Niki Trento
